plot: Kenji Gion is a short first-year high school student. On his first day in Kanagawa Prefectural High School, he meets the tall Sumiaki Iwashimizu during a game of rugby. Kenji strikes a friendship with Sumiaki, and soon joins the rugby club. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Seija no Kōshin" (March of the Living) by CIVILIAN
ending_theme: "Zenryoku Shōnen produced by Okuda Tamio" (全力少年 produced by 奥田民生) by Sukima Switch
